name: Objective Circle
description:
Get ready for a thrill adventure through awesome levels and mazes.

Be careful though, at some points your character might change it's circle color, and you won't be able to touch other platform colors other than the one of your current circle color.

So go ahead and have fun with this one of a kind gameplay and adventure. Nothing can't and won't stop you.

Your objective, is to gather all the colors of your circle: OBJECTIVE CIRCLE

Features:

- unique gameplay
- amazing levels
- simple design
- enticing music and sound effects
- tons of fun

Support us by reviewing this app and your experience with it.
